overview:
Lamelza, a graduate of Evangel University is universally known as the former CEO of Team Media, which started in 1995 as a small web services company and by 2001 was one of the fastest growing web services companies in the United States. Lamelza has gone on to form other companies and continues to provide leadership as an active board member to those entities.

With global experience in new media marketing planning and execution; customer/constituent retention; and market focused technology, he is a vetted professional in deploying corporate strategies with a focus on client recruitment using outside-the-box marketing tactics. A member of SEMPO National Speakers Bureau, Lamelza is an expert and speaker with respect to the convergence of marketing and technology.

Lamelza was inducted into the International Academy of the Visual and has also been recognized by the Business Journal as one of Missouriâ€™s top 40 under 40 young professionals. His broad expertise provides continued results to companies seeking to position themselves with next generation of new media.
